data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aspoeck, Ulrike, Liu, Xingyue, Aspoeck, Horst (2015): The Dilaridae of the Balkan Peninsula and of Anatolia (Insecta, Neuropterida, Neuroptera). Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift 62 (2): 123-135, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.62.5199, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.62.5199
